sentence: pic.twitter.com/6zG0ubtqf1 — Josh Mandel (@JoshMandelOhio) February 21, 2022 In his post, Mandel included an image of a screenshot of the notice he received from Facebook, which read, “You can’t post or comment for 24 hours,” because, “you previously posted something that didn’t follow our Community Standards.” “This post goes against our standards on hate speech, so only you can see it,” the message from Facebook added.
author: Alana Mastrangelo
title: Facebook Drops ‘Hate Speech’ Suspension for OH GOP Candidate Josh Mandel

sentence: Washington (CNN)A new television ad from Ohio Republican Senate candidate Josh Mandel is centered on a false claim that Republican primary rival Mike Gibbons, a businessman, said that military service isn't "real work."
author: Daniel Dale
title: Fact check: Ad from Ohio Republican Josh Mandel falsely claims party rival Mike Gibbons said military service isn't real work

sentence: OHIO GOP SENATE SHOWDOWN: FIREBRAND REP. CAWTHORN ENDORSES JOSH MANDEL IN CROWDED REPUBLICAN PRIMARY The statements drew the ire of fellow Republicans who demanded to know names.
author: Marisa Schultz
title: Madison Cawthorn addresses 'orgy,' cocaine controversy
